mapper.sql: id, line_name as lineName, company, unit_id as unitId, line_length as lineLength, radius, address, voltage_level as voltageLevel, rated_current as ratedCurrent, line_type as lineType, main_line as mainLine, access_time as accessTime, create_time as createTime, create_by as createBy, update_time as updateTime, update_by as updateBy, is_deleted as isDeleted, line_status as lineStatus, unit_name as unitName
mapper.insert: insert into t_lineInfo( id, line_name, company, unit_id, line_length, radius, address, voltage_level, rated_current, line_type, main_line, access_time, create_time, create_by, line_status, unit_name ) values( #{id}, #{lineName}, #{company}, #{unitId}, #{lineLength}, #{radius}, #{address}, #{voltageLevel}, #{ratedCurrent}, #{lineType}, #{mainLine}, #{accessTime}, now(), #{createBy}, #{lineStatus}, #{unitName} )
mapper.update:
update t_lineInfo set
line_name = #{lineName},
unit_id = #{unitId},
line_length = #{lineLength},
radius = #{radius},
address = #{address},
voltage_level = #{voltageLevel},
rated_current = #{ratedCurrent},
line_type = #{lineType},
access_time = #{accessTime},
line_status = #{lineStatus},
unit_name = #{unitName},
update_time = now(), update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select , (select c.`value` from t_code c where c.is_deleted = 0 and c.type = 't_line_type' and c.code = t.line_type limit 1) as lineTypeName, (case when main_line = '0' then '无' else (select l.line_name from t_lineInfo l where l.id = t.main_line limit 1) end) as mainLineName, (select c.`value` from t_code c where c.is_deleted = 0 and c.type = 't_line_status' and c.`code` =t.line_status limit 1) as lineStatusName from t_lineInfo t where t.is_deleted = 0 and exists (select 1 from t_user u where u.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = t.company) order by t.create_time desc
select count(1) from t_lineInfo t where t.is_deleted = 0 and exists (select 1 from t_user u where u.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = t.company) and t.main_line = #{param1}
